Skills.sDesc: able to perform basic maintenance on armor
able to perform basic maintenance on weapons
able to use ropes and tie knots.
a character with endurance is able to perform continual physical activity for twice as long as normal character.
+1 damage with a single weapon of the characters choice.
character with this talent takes 1/2 damage from blunt weapons

Character has a natural AC of 8. If the character wears armor that would improve his AC better than 8 this ability has no effect. If the character wears armor that give him an ac of 8 or worse he may add +1 bonus to his AC.
see in the infra spectrum for 30ft.
